mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_tb(shareHouseId, writerId, date, title, content) VALUES(#{shareHouseId}, #{writerId}, #{date}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT shareHouseId, writerId, date, title, content FROM shareHouse_tb
SELECT shareHouseId, writerId, date, title, content FROM shareHouse_tb WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
SELECT shareHouseId, writerId, date, title, content FROM shareHouse_tb WHERE shareHouseId = #{shareHouseId}
